title: Bubbles Co-op: secondary fiction (Episode 3)
brief_description: This films presents two fiction films from the University of Melbourne “Bubbles Co-op” Film Festival. ine is in black and white and is technically poor; the second is shorter in length and is in colour. Suitable for Upper Primary-Upper Secondary level students. No other credits available.
